channel.title: Client UID
channel.description:
Does anyone know where to find the client's UID? Need it order to use client enforcement.
Thanks in advance.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 07:40:52 pm[/size][hr]Nevermind. Found it in the Signlink class.
